colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

errorBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is invalid.

items.description: The number of inputs to display.

focusBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is focused.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

manageFocus.description: If `true`, focus will move automatically to the next input once filled.

mask.description: If `true`, the input's value will be masked just like `type=password`.

onComplete.description: Function called when all inputs have valid values.

otp.description: If `true`, the pin input component signals to its fields that they should.

type.description: The type of values the pin-input should allow.

value.description: The value of the pin input.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.
